duties_responsibilities.duty: Serving customers quickly, accurately, efficiently, and confidentially according to the bank's service standards.
Identifying customer needs and expectations by listening for clues and making referrals to expand customer relationships.
Processing transactions for savings, checking, and loan accounts, as well as maintaining a neat and orderly work area.
Resolving customer problems and complaints with courtesy and discretion, considering them as opportunities to satisfy the customer and promote additional services.
Balancing transactions daily and maintaining compliance with banking regulations and security procedures.
Guiding and training new tellers and assisting with customer-facing technology such as self-service options.
